pr_title: [API change] Added convenient upload method to BlobClient

timeline.message: Added convenient upload method to BlobClient

timeline.bodyText: I thought this method was only java 9?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: yep, I need to change it

replies.bodyText: I made the PR before I realized

timeline.bodyText: Could this go into StorageImplUtils for the time being? Do we expected or would want a customer to use this API in the near-term?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: I have nothing against doing that
replies.author: gapra-msft
